other_tests.findings: Visual acuity improved from 20/32 to 20/16, visual field expanded from constricted to normal, and contrast sensitivity improved.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement maintained over 18 months with intermittent therapy.

other_tests.findings: No change observed in lesion size by fundus photography.
Mean deviation improved from -25.4 to -1.05 dB.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Visual acuity, contrast sensitivity, and visual fields remained normal for 5 months.

other_tests.findings: Did not demonstrate significant leakage at the optic nerve head.
No change in cerebellar or spinal lesions.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement in vision was immediate post-surgery.
